about_the_game:
Experience the thrill of discovery in "Seeker of the Ruins Demo," an engaging sample of the full exploration adventure featuring a single area of the depths of ancient dwarven ruins. As a courageous dwarf delver, your mission is to uncover long-lost treasures, unravel hidden secrets, and navigate the perilous underground labyrinths of a once-glorious civilization.



Key Features:

Immersive Exploration: Dive into a carefully selected part of the intricately designed dwarven ruins, offering a taste of the unique environments and secrets waiting in the full game.
Survival and Strategy: Utilize a variety of gadgets and potions to overcome environmental hazards, evade traps, dodge monsters, and outsmart ancient mechanisms.
Non-Combat Gameplay: Experience a refreshing take on adventure games with a focus on exploration and problem-solving, without the need for combat.
Challenging Puzzles: Test your wits with a wide range of puzzles that require thinking outside the box to understand
Gadgets: Collect and buy various items & gadgets that can aid in your exploration, such as potions, flashbangs, and more!

Embark on a brief but memorable journey into the unknown and get a first look at the mysteries to be fully unveiled in the complete "Seeker of the Ruins." Are you ready to take your first steps and reclaim a piece of the forgotten legacy of the dwarves?

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:

short_description: As a fearless dwarf delver, navigate intricate underground labyrinths, uncover hidden treasures, and solve riddles. Use gadgets and potions to survive and outsmart environmental hazards in this immersive non-combat adventure. Delve into the unknown and reclaim the legacy of a lost civilization
